::KitKat:

She had a wide grin on her face as she looked at Scyther. She checked 
her scanner and sure enough, there was a maximal signature standing 
right infront of her. She couldn't help but chuckle slightly. "Oh 
please, by all mean, infultrate the maximal base and find out all you 
can, then bring the info back to me. Just becareful. These maximals 
are not dumb. They are smart, very smart. Watch your back."

She really didn't think he needed to hear that, but she felt like it 
should be said.  They didn't know the maximals and she wanted to be 
aware of the enimy that they would face. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Sorry for lack of detail, the bell rang and I GTG.
> 
> 
> ::Killfest/Scyther::
> 
> Killfest nods. "A bot into their base? Hmm..."
> 
> He steps to one side. "Scyther, make yourself a Maximal."
> 
> Scyther steps forward and mutters an activation code. His robot 
mode 
> shifts around. Several seconds later a completely new bot stands in 
> Scyther's place, with blue optics and the build of a Maximal.
> 
> "There's your bot. You want him to take off now?"
>
